text: The Jericho Jewish Center (JJC) is a Conservative Jewish congregation located in Jericho, New York. The congregation was established in 1955, when it began meeting on a local private estate. Construction of the Jericho Jewish Center synagogue began June 1959, and completed in 1960.Poliakoff, Ira. Synagogues of Long Island, Arcadia Publishing, 2017. The Iken STEM Science Academy Preschool, housed in the Jericho Jewish Center, opened in 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Jewish organizations established in 1955 Category:Conservative synagogues in New York (state) Category:Synagogues in Nassau County, New York Category:1955 establishments in New York (state) Category:Synagogues completed in 1960
title: Jericho Jewish Center
